posts.content:
NWN SoU+HotU 1.69 Camera Mod by Roma_CZ

Unofficial NWMAIN.EXE modification.
  1. Unlock camera angle, so u can look to the sky.[/*:m]
  2. Unlock camera distance, so u can see game like FPS, or zoom out far away.[/*:m]
  3. Increase FOG distance.[/*:m]
[/list]


******************************

In my opinion, this is a must have. It grants a huge amount of freedom regarding the camera so that everyone gets what he needs. Personally I use version 1 over version 2 since the former gives the possibility to zoom further out than the latter, which I find very practical.
